doc.title: 'Deutschland' Leaving New York at Full Speed (with Prince Henry of Prussia)
doc.plot: A fine view of the great ocean liner leaving New York Harbor under full speed, accompanied by a fleet of tugs and excursion craft. We regret that at the late hour of the day on which this picture was taken, and the murky condition of the atmosphere, prevented our getting a perfect picture photographically, but the historical significance of the subject prompts us to list the picture.

A fine view of the great ocean liner leaving New York Harbor under full speed, accompanied by a fleet of tugs and excursion craft. We regret that at the late hour of the day on which this picture was taken, and the murky condition of the atmosphere, prevented our getting a perfect picture photographically, but the historical significance of the subject prompts us to list the picture.
